entry.title: dotnet/announcements - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2024-21404 | .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #296
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2024-21386: .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #295
  • .NET February 2024 Updates #294

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [6.0] Failure in System.Net.Security.Tests.SyncSslStreamSystemDefaultTest.ClientAndServer_OneOrBothUseDefault_Ok due to remote TLS alert 'ProtocolVersion' #98394
  • Add "Who built this" to dotnet --info #98387
  • msbuild throws CS9215, but dotnet build doesn't #98382
  • DWARF errors with `nm` on linux-musl #98377
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2024-21404 | .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #98373
  • Add benchmarks for TensorPrimitives #98369
    9.0.0
  • RequiresUnreferencedCode not suppressing warning from explicitly implemented generic method using lambda method #98368
  • [browser][MT] use code generator to get JSExport methods/ reduce reflection #98366
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] drop wrap_error_root,wrap_no_error_root #98365
    9.0.0
  • Polymorphic properties of request models are not being validated in asp.net core #98363
  • Debugging With Primary Constructor #98359
  • NativeAOT: support for building static libraries for Debug CRT on Windows #98356
  • [QUIC] Implement MsQuicConfiguration cache #98354
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Proposal for Automatic Temporary Directory Management #98349
  • Process.WaitForExitAsync does not return when awaited process is killed if output is redirected #98347
  • [API Proposal]: Add missing Math.BigMul overloads #98346
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 2 Regressions on 2/7/2024 9:09:09 PM #98371
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 16 Regressions on 2/5/2024 1:05:09 PM #98370
  • [API Proposal]: Consider support for `\U` escape sequence in `Regex` #98341
  • [Wasm][Perf] Wasm Wasm BDN perf tests are failing to build with top level stack overflow. #98334

Closed

  • [mono][marshal] Assertion should not be reached in mono_marshal_shared_conv_to_icall #98307
    9.0.0
  • banana24SourceBuild and centos8SourceBuild are broken in runtime rolling pipeline #98364
    9.0.0
  • Support HttpClient custom logging outslide of HttpClientFactory #98312
  • HttpClient Support Data URLs (scheme data:) #95838
  • The handling of NaN in TensorPrimitives.Max() is inconsistent with Enumerable.Max() #98367
  • Fix initlocals handling with mono interpreter #37955
    9.0.0
  • Asp.Net Core does not properly handle the error with polymorphic deserialization from STJ when type discriminator is not specified #98358
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 26 Regressions on 2/4/2024 5:39:31 PM #98042
  • System.Threading.RateLimiting.DefaultPartitionedRateLimiter cache invalidation bug #95611
    9.0.0
  • Performance of Trigonometric math function have unbelievable loss at .NET8 #95954
  • SqlServer.Types is 20% slower on .NET 8 #96211
    9.0.0
  • [RyuJIT] Improve VZEROUPPER insertion #11496
    Future
  • vzeroupper fails to be emitted in some P/Invoke scenarios #82132
    9.0.0
  • Test failure System.Net.Security.Tests.SslStreamCertificateContextOcspLinuxTests.RefreshOcspResponse_BeforeExpiration #97936
    9.0.0
  • Test duration reported by `dotnet test` is inaccurate for xUnit async tests, but only at certain verbosity levels #98205
  • MAUI project with non-ASCII project name cannot release to my Android phone #83203
    9.0.0
  • [wasi] bump WASI SDK #98315
    9.0.0
  • [Proposal] Add new overload to Uri.EscapeDataString #40603
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.Tests.WebWorkerWebSocketTest.WebSocketClient_CancelInDifferentThread #98344
    9.0.0
  • HTTP POST and PUT requests fail with "The response ended prematurely" #98177
  • Type preinitialization skips dataflow analysis #97286
    9.0.0
  • BinSkim warnings from NativeAOT Linux binaries #96848
    9.0.0
  • Cannot publish a .net 8 preview web api aot project to native executable, getting strange error #98338

PullRequests

Created

  • Implement ReadOnlySpan.CastUp #98395
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix more bugs found with ILVerify #98393
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Don't strip pointed-to type information in IL stubs #98392
    area-Interop-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Move reflection from JS to C# #98391
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [release/7.0-staging] Manually depad RSAES-PKCS1 on Apple OSes #98390
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security
  • [release/8.0-staging] Manually depad RSAES-PKCS1 on Apple OSes #98389
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security
  • Add some more null guards in the OSSL crypto PAL #98386
    area-System.Security, 9.0.0
  • [release/6.0-staging] Send connection WINDOW_UPDATE before RTT PING #98385
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [release/7.0-staging] Send connection WINDOW_UPDATE before RTT PING #98384
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [release/8.0-staging] Send connection WINDOW_UPDATE before RTT PING #98383
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Importer forward substitution #98380
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove DAM from design-time attributes #98378
    area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Disable failing OCSP tests tests #98362
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Don't call user callbacks on MsQuic worker thread. #98361
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Shrink `.eh_frame` section in naot executables #98355
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add ARM64 encodings for group IF_SVE_GQ_3A #98352
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • JIT: Add a simple `Counter` dumpable #98350
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] Add new test for multi-threading SignalR in Blazor WBT #98343
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono
  • Avoid double writes to PDB in NAOT publish #98342
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #98339
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fold "cast(cast(obj, cls), cls)" to "cast(obj, cls)" #98337
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove remaining CRT PAL wrappers and enable including standard headers in the CoreCLR build #98336
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • JIT: ARM64 SVE format encodings, `SVE_HX_3A_B` to `SVE_JL_3A` and `SVE_IC_3A` to `SVE_IC_3A_C` #98332
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve

Merged

  • Gracefully error-out on StringBuilder BSTR marshalling on Mono #98379
    area-Interop-mono, 9.0.0
  • Don't pass --os inferred from TargetRID unless Short Stack #98381
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • TryAddEnumerable test avoid false negatives #96871
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Using dotnet 9's save assembly api for debugging DI IL emit #98234
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #98374
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0 #98375
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0 #98376
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • Send connection WINDOW_UPDATE before RTT PING #97881
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Update where and when vzeroupper is emitted #98261
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Mono] [Amd64/WASM] Disable vector constructors intrinsics #98320
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [mono][interp] Enable test #98360
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Clear _cacheInvalid flag after rebuilding limiter cache in DefaultPartitionedRateLimiter #98075
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Fixed wrong comment in XxHash64 #97747
    community-contribution, area-System.IO.Hashing
  • [mono][interp] Prevent SSA IRops from producing jiterp aborts #98345
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add FR_2A, GB_2A, FV_2A, FY_3A #98248
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • [VMR] Add metabuild properties to enable property-controlled VMR build modes. #98321
    source-build, area-Build-mono, needs-area-label
  • Unpin wasi docker image in pipeline-with-resources.yml #98357
    needs-area-label
  • [wasi] Bump wasi sdk to 21. #98340
    area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • [browser][MT] preparation for deputy #98298
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Add span-based Uri {Try}{Un}EscapeDataString overloads #98074
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • [wasm][bench] Fix one more place with old tfm #98348
    area-Build-mono
  • Make ordering an explicit part of `CountBy` and `AggregateBy` testing. #98311
    area-System.Linq
  • [RISC-V] Fix gc-related bugs in risc-v emitter #98226
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Don't allow preinitialization to skip dataflow #98318
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Prepare the FabricBot config for migration to Policy Service #98256
    area-Meta, 9.0.0
  • Harden UnixPkcs12Reader AllocHGlobal #98331
    area-System.Security, 9.0.0
  • Ensure the assert in IsEmbMaskOp is correct #98306
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [manual] Merge release/8.0-staging into release/8.0 #98328
    needs-area-label
  • [manual] Merge release/7.0-staging into release/7.0 #98326
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [manual] Merge release/6.0-staging into release/6.0 #98325
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow, 6.0.28
  • Delete unnecessary test exclusion #98329
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Updated

  • Fast FieldInfo reflection #98199
    area-System.Reflection, tenet-performance
  • Expose AVX512F embedded rounding intrinsics. #97415
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Enable use-after-return checking in ASAN #89204
    area-Infrastructure
  • JIT ARM64 SVE: Add FZ_2A, HG_2A, GZ_3A, GV_3A, GY_3*, DV_4A #98310
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Fix remaining issues before enabling new EH by default #98322
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Add interface implementing type to OverrideInformation and use where it makes sense #98274
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • JIT: ARM64 SVE format encodings, `SVE_GG_3A` to `SVE_GH_3A` #98316
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #97072
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • Remove synchronization from Http2Connection.ExtendWindow #97878
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Improve CopySign performance for integer types #90970
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [wasm][wasi] Throw error when WasmBuildNative is explicitly set to false during a single-file build #98087
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • Support for WASI threads #98120
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, community-contribution, os-wasi
  • CoreCLR NativeAOT - ByRef generics and ByRef implementing interfaces #98070
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Support generic arguments for calli in CoreCLR #97079
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • CallSiteValidator doesn't cache results of the walk #96254
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Fix problem with fgExpandQmarkForCastInstOf #97493
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Added more verbose error message when calling method using reflection and target type does not match passed type #98129
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Remove C FILE PAL wrappers #98238
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] deputy #98118
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Restore RSA 16384 tests to innerloop #98102
    area-System.Security, test-enhancement
  • Update unified build controls #98330
    needs-area-label
  • Remove fgExpandQmarkForCastInstOf #96687
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Initialize native layout info for small structs during type load #97877
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • JIT: Add scalar evolution analysis and do IV widening based on it #97865
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] Log ManagedThreadId and NativeThreadId for known test failures #98291
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser
  • [browser] Use standard xunit test runner on multithreaded runtime #91317
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • VM: Include generic instantiations in stack frames #96440
    area-System.Diagnostics, community-contribution
  • Don't allow creating 1-byte dead basic blocks #98319
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Do not throw in AssemblyExtensions.TryGetRawMetadata. #96370
    area-System.Reflection, runtime-mono, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0-staging] Fix IsFixupPrecodeByASM and StubPrecode::IsStubPrecodeByASM #95859
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • Scalar/Packed conversions for floating point to integer #97529
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Reintroduce case sensitive comparison optimization for FrozenDictionary in some cases #95232
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • fix SendTo with SocketAsyncEventArgs #98134
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 9.0.0
  • Optimize equality operators #98196
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • JIT: update block weight for uncond to cond flow opt #98324
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use Binary Search Tree for Frozen Collections length buckets strategy #94768
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Runtime hang after updating net48 project to .NET 8 SDK #38746

Closed

  • error MSB3971: The reference assemblies for ".NETFramework,Version=v8.0" were not found. #37436

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0.3xx] Fix issue where applying rollback file would incorrectly uninstall workload packs #38740
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Fix issue where applying rollback file would incorrectly uninstall workload packs #38737
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.2xx #38735
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.1xx #38734
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.4xx #38733
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.3xx #38732
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.1xx #38731
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.4xx #38730
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.1xx #38729
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.3xx] [`dotnet list package`]Resolve relative paths #38724
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix issue where applying rollback file would incorrectly uninstall workload packs #38712
    untriaged, Area-Workloads

Merged

  • [`dotnet list package`]Resolve relative paths #38306
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #38693
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Add Install Records for VS Managed Workloads During 'Update' #38346
    Area-Workloads
  • NET tool roll forward error experience #38210
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #38692
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Proposal: Semi-Auto-Properties; `field` keyword #140

  • [Proposal]: Collection Expressions Next (C#13 and beyond) #7913

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • It seems dotnet_diagnostic.IDE0058.severity in .editorconfig started to be ignored with today's VS update (13 feb 2024) #72094
  • Add public API to determine if a call is being intercepted #72093
    17.10
  • `AttributeListSyntax` trivia appears to be lost after applying a code fix #72088
  • Bogus nullability warning for using lifted struct operators #72085
  • Set default C# Interactive version to latest #72084
  • "Find all references" does not find implementation of "partial void" method #72083
  • "Convert to raw string" code fix is not always available for `$@` strings #72082

Closed

  • MSBuildWorkspace does not cleanly load blazorwasm project #72015
  • ConvertToPositionalRecordAsync produces a gold bar error when attempting to change generated files #72067
  • [Bug]: 'Invert Logical' code action has malformatted message #70828
    17.9
  • Suggestion: Improve C# REPL (C# Interactive) shortcut #49017
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump a few transitively included packages to 8.0 #72092
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add an assertion that the .NET Core BuildHost is deployed #72091
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Defer parsing syntax trees when computing frozen partial solutions #72090
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add more tests and address some of the PROTOTYPE comments #72089
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Remove nonreentrantlock type #72087
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Unify handling of constant and not constant chars during string concat #72086
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Cache frozen partial solution snapshots acquired off of a solution instance #71999
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Do not attempt to update generated code in 'Convert to record' #72073
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove -windows TFM being used in MSBuild tests #72040
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Re-add EA.RazorCompiler IVT #72057
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Correct show behavior in IntelliSense page. #71857
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Use collection expressions in IDE code. #72063
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add tests validating behavior #72068
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Always publish logs for CI builds #72058
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Extract factory interface for AbstractSnippetExpansionClient #71752
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix race conditions in TestNoBlockOnCompletionItems4 #72061
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix race condition in RequestExecutionQueue #72059
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Onboard C# Intellisense page to Unified Settings #71780
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Update to 8.0.0 in 17.10 branch #71916
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add invariant around nullable conditional state #72072
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged, 17.10
  • Support relative paths in interceptors #71879
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Run integration tests on helix #71328
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Semantic search #71268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add compilation start / stop ETW events #72031
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Grab 4 more bits for use as node flags. Use additional bit to store if nodes contain attributes within them. #72070
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Implementation of sub-heading spans (for sticky scroll) #69915
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove "is final document state" from compilation trackers. #72045
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Rename Tools/Options inline hint settings #71855
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Change NullableWalker.VisitConversion to not unsplit #72062
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Refactor where we do project type detection and sending telemetry #71969
    Area-IDE
  • Enable support for an LSP client to open source generated files #68771
    Area-IDE
  • Wait for navigation to complete #71994
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Definition items #71959
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Improve codegen for concatenation of `string` and `char` (attempt 2) #71793
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Implement control flow graph for Lock object feature #71987
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lock Type
  • Semantic snippets: Work on `ctor` snippet after modifiers #71869
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Fix NRE in primary constructor XML doc binder #72006
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Primary Constructors

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [9.0-preview.1] Request Delegate Generator emits nullable annotations when Nullable Reference Types not enabled #54020
  • Blazor 6.0 app fails to compile in 8.0.200. #54019
  • .NET 8 Blazor - OnChange() Migration To Static Rendering #54018
  • Failing test CanLaunchPhotinoWebViewAndClickButton in 8.0 on Windows.Amd64.Server.2022 #54017
  • WebHostTests.HelixPlatform_QuicListenerIsSupported failing on Fedora.34 in release/8.0 #54016
  • Perf regression: json #54014
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #54013
  • npm publishing is broken #54012
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2024-21386: .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #54008
  • SpaProxyMiddleware Launch Page #54006
  • `[AllowedValues]` and `[DeniedValues]` case insensitivness suport #54003
  • .NET 8 Blazor - Provide Better Developer Feedback for Parameter Deserialization Issues #54002
  • .NET 8 Blazor - Support localization change without page reload #54001
  • TicketSerializer deserialized authentication ticket does not match the serialized one. #53998
  • .NET 8 Blazor - NavigationManager.NavigateTo() Inconsistent Behavior #53996
  • Expose JavaScript interoperability Initialization Status in Blazor #53995
  • .NET 8 Blazor - Form With Multiple Buttons Inconsistent Behavior #53993
  • [DataProtection] Deadlock at application start when trying to get DataProtection key from Azure KeyVault #53989
  • InputSelect not selecting the binded value as expected #53988
  • AddDataProtection().SetApplicationName does not allow one project to read values set by another #53987
  • Blazor QuickGrid - Add class based on row item context property value #53982
  • donet 8 Blazor Interactive Server does not route to Razor Pages (MVC) #53979

Closed

  • [Blazor] `@key` is not respected for interactive WebAssembly components after publish #53289
    8.0.x
  • Registration confirmation link incorrect for /register endpoint in net8.0 Identity #52666
  • StreamRendering Not Working As Expected #53980
  • Blazor App, individual Accounts and Authorization #52800
  • Incorporate template analyzer into the build #35238
  • Find replacement for NuGet Package Verifier #18931
  • Perf improvement: mvc #53981
  • Hosting bundle downgrade error when 6.0.11 exists #45491
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Add configurations to test matrix #36032
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Blazor WASM child component rendering, despite indentical parameters #53990
  • restore.cmd fails if environment variable "projects" defined #35796
  • Globalization and Upgrading a Package #54004
  • Update test matrix for .net 8 #46555
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Quickgrid table design problem #53729
  • Blazor page route set to "/bin" causes 404 Error when published to Azure #53645
  • Managing Checkboxes with [SupplyParameterFromForm] in Blazor #53884
  • Handle 3rd party NPM dependencies in source-build #53710
  • Perf improvement: json, json #53952
  • Perf improvement: mvc #53969
  • UseStaticFiles, ability to log not found file's path. #53711
  • Ignore issue comments starting with "Looks like this PR hasn't been active for some time..." #53859

PullRequests

Created

  • [Infrastructure] Add a github workflow to update NPM dependencies #54000
    area-infrastructure
  • [Infrastructure] Update npm dependencies #53986
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `4872968` to `b75ecf1` #53985
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `4872968` to `b75ecf1` #53984
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • [release/8.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `4872968` to `b75ecf1` #53983
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.x

Merged

  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #54009
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.28
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0 #54011
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.3
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0 #54010
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.17
  • Fix time scale #54021
    area-signalr, 9.0-preview2
  • Update build to use a local package cache from a submodule and build offline #53975
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview2
  • [Blazor] Fix `@key` not being respected for interactive WebAssembly components after publish #53746
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview2

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • continuation of androidx.collection.ArrayMapKt is defined multiple times #18665 #20561

  • Collection View scroll is laggy #20557
  • Double border in MacOS and iOS #20556
  • [Testing] NativeAOT: Controls.Sample.UITests crashing or hanging #20553
    .NET 9 Planning
  • `Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Shapes.PathGeometryConverter` does not load `Path` `Data` from Resource files in Release mode, but works fine in Debug mode #20552
  • remove_RequestedThemeChanged cause null reference #20551
  • Endless measure cycle on Android when WebView is placed inside Frame #20550
  • Shell.Current.FlyoutIsPresented = true still does not toggle the first time on Android #20549
  • The User Interface moved up when the keyboard appears in Android platform #20548
  • StackLayout Orientation binding is a real mess #20545
  • The navigation menu does not display the current cursor position correctly #20539
  • On iOS, CollectionView Header size changed causes overlap #20538
  • [Testing] Re-enable/move TrackColorInitializesCorrectly/TrackColorUpdatesCorrectly to Appium #20535
    Backlog
  • [Testing] Re-Enable/move DoneClosesKeyboard to Appium #20533
    Backlog

Closed

  • [Regression] [Android] [Maps] Map locks up after adding ~200-300 locations to Polyline #20532
  • Add support for RelativeBindingSource to TypedBinding #20101
  • Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Maps control is currently broken on Android #20317

Created

Merged

  • Fix connectivity broadcast receiver never triggered on android 14.0/34+ #19968

  • [Android] Make Flyout footer aware of header/content margin #19303

Updated

  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 3 updates #20460

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Docker + "The FrameworkReference 'Microsoft.WindowsDesktop.App.WindowsForms' was not recognized" on v8.0.2 #33088
  • Tracking changes in json column in EF Core 8 and postgres #33087
  • Using generic key in TPH causes multiple columns on child tables #33086
  • Include on multiple Many-to-Many relationships of the same CLR-Type returns empty set when bi-directional relationship is configured #33081
  • ProxyFactory should be extendible to allow other interfaces to be proxied #33080
  • Access to a collection on an entity in Added state with lazy loading enabled #33079
  • EF.Property throws exception when used with dynamic property name from a different entity #33078
  • Deleting an attached entity in TPH succeeds even if it is of the wrong type #33077

PullRequests

Created

  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0 #33085
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0 #33084
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #33083

Merged

  • Fix to #32911 - ComplexProperty with AsSplitQuery #33020

entry.content:

Closed

    Discussion
